input.system_prompt:
You are an AI assistant evaluating product relevancy.
Your goal is to determine how relevant a list of competitor products are to a specific reference product, based on names and descriptions.
Output the scores as a JSON object containing a single key 'scores', which is an array of objects. Each object in the array must have 'competitor_product_name' (the exact competitor product name provided in the input), 'relevancy_score' (an integer 1-10), and 'rationale' (a brief explanation for the score).

The relevancy scale is 1-10:
- 1: Not relevant at all.
- 10: Identical product.

Important scoring guidelines:
- Focus on product function, features, silhouette, and construction
- DO NOT emphasize color or pattern when scoring, as the reference product may encompass a wide range of colors/patterns not specified
- Consider the core product type, shape, materials, and intended use
- Evaluate if the products serve similar purposes and would appeal to similar customers
- Ensure every competitor product listed receives a score.
input.user_prompt:
Reference Brand: "Tie Bar"
Reference Product Name: "Men's Polo Shirt"
Reference Product Description:
Discover the perfect blend of comfort, quality, and style with our men's knit polos collection.

Competitor Products to Evaluate (Max 25):
  - Name='Uniqlo Polo Shirt Set of 5'
  - Name='Patagonia Men's Daily Polo Shirt'
  - Name='Patagonia M's Essential Polo'
  - Name='Banana Republic Men's Luxury Touch Short Sleeve Polo Shirt'
  - Name='Uniqlo Men's Polo Shirt'
  - Name='Banana Republic Men's Luxe Touch Long Sleeve Polo Shirt'
  - Name='Men's Slim Luxe Touch Polo'
  - Name='Uniqlo Men's Preppy Rugby Polo Shirt'
  - Name='Lululemon Men's True Navy Evolution Short-Sleeved Polo Shirt'
  - Name='Patagonia Men's Squeaky Clean Polo'
  - Name='J.Crew Men's Long-Sleeve Coolmax Polo Shirt'
  - Name='Patagonia Men's A/C Shirt'
  - Name='J.Crew Men's Cotton Sweater- Polo'
  - Name='UNIQLO Kids Dry Pique Striped Polo Shirt'
  - Name='Lululemon Men's Showzero Polo Shirt'
  - Name='lululemon Men's Metal Vent Tech Polo Shirt'
  - Name='Banana Republic Men's Luxury-Touch Polo Shirt Black Size L'
  - Name='Patagonia Men's Polo'
  - Name='lululemon Men's Logo Sport Polo Short Sleeve Updated Fit'
  - Name='Lululemon Men's Evolution Short-Sleeve Polo Shirt'
  - Name='Men's Slim Luxe Touch Polo'
  - Name='Lululemon Men's Striped Mesh Tennis Polo Shirt'
  - Name='Banana Republic Men's Luxury Touch Standard Fit Polo Shirt'
  - Name='Uniqlo Men's Polo Shirt'
  - Name='Uniqlo Men's Stripes Polo Shirt'

Based on the reference product description and each competitor product's name, please provide the relevancy score for *each* competitor product using the 1-10 scale. Remember to focus on product features, silhouette, and construction rather than color or pattern. Return the results in the specified JSON format (an object with a 'scores' array, where each item has 'competitor_product_name', 'relevancy_score', and 'rationale' explaining why you assigned that score).

scores.description: An array of relevancy scores for the competitor products.

competitor_product_name.description: The exact name of the competitor product as provided in the input.

rationale.description: Brief explanation for why this score was assigned.

scores_with_rationales.rationale: This is a set of classic men's polo shirts, directly matching the core silhouette, intended use, and likely construction of the reference product.
A standard men's polo shirt from Patagonia, functionally and structurally very similar to the reference polo.
This is a quintessential men's polo shirt, highly relevant based on product type and intended use.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Banana Republic Men's Luxury Touch Short Sleeve Polo Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Short sleeve men's polo, similar material focus (comfort/quality), excellent match.
A standard men's polo shirt from Uniqlo, aligns perfectly with reference product.
A standard men's polo shirt from Uniqlo, aligns perfectly with reference product.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Banana Republic Men's Luxe Touch Long Sleeve Polo Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: A long sleeve version of a men's polo shirt; very similar, but sleeve length differentiates slightly from the usual short-sleeve knit polo.
Men's classic polo shirt with a slim fit; core features match the reference closely.
Men's classic polo shirt with a slim fit; core features match the reference closely.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Uniqlo Men's Preppy Rugby Polo Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Rugby polos have a similar silhouette, but their construction and styling tend to be sportier/heavier than classic knit polos.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Lululemon Men's True Navy Evolution Short-Sleeved Polo Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Short-sleeved men's polo shirt, modern fabric likely, but matches core type and use.
A classic men's polo shirt with a focus on comfort, echoes reference product in purpose and structure.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: J.Crew Men's Long-Sleeve Coolmax Polo Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: A long-sleeve version of a classic polo; strong relevance but slightly distinct due to sleeve length.
Although a men's shirt, 'A/C Shirt' generally refers to a lightweight woven button-up, not a polo silhouette.
A polo with sweater construction, similar silhouette and use, but heavier material distinguishes it from classic knit polos.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: UNIQLO Kids Dry Pique Striped Polo Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Kids' product, not menswear; not the same customer or use case, despite similar construction.
Modern men's polo shirt, matches in silhouette, function, and likely materials.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: lululemon Men's Metal Vent Tech Polo Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Men's performance polo, very similar in construction and intended use to reference polos.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Banana Republic Men's Luxury-Touch Polo Shirt Black Size L
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Standard men's short-sleeve polo; color and size don't affect fundamental match.
A men's classic polo, core match to reference product.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: lululemon Men's Logo Sport Polo Short Sleeve Updated Fit
scores_with_rationales.rationale: A sport-inspired men's polo, function and structure nearly identical to the reference.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Lululemon Men's Evolution Short-Sleeve Polo Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: A classic men's polo shirt, core match in every respect.
Men's polo shirt with a slim fit; identical product category and purpose.
Men's polo shirt with a slim fit; identical product category and purpose.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Lululemon Men's Striped Mesh Tennis Polo Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Men's mesh tennis polo; core polo silhouette, designed for sports but could serve similar purposes.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Banana Republic Men's Luxury Touch Standard Fit Polo Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Standard fit, classic men's polo; matches the reference precisely.
Classic men's polo shirt from Uniqlo; direct match with the reference.
